question: {name} caught {n} {fish}s last {day}, the first {fish} he caught weighs {w1} {unit}s, the second {fish} he caught weighs {w2} {unit}s, and each of the rest {fish} he caught weighs {diff} {unit}s more than the second one. If a {unit} of {fish} costs {cur}{price}, how much will he earn after selling all the {fish}s to the market?
